author: Upper Echelon
description:
Epic Games (in partnership with Disney) recently unveiled a new AI controlled Darth Vader Fortnite NPC, and the results have been comedically predictable.

As the community began tricking the character into saying all sorts of unexpected things, questions about ethical and safe usage of AI are making their way to the forefront of the Video Game space. As cool as it is for a character to be this dynamic, there are serious drawbacks that have to be considered.
